forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 43 overnight. East northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. North northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 49. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated snow showers before 4am, then scattered rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 33. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Isolated Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 5pm, then isolated snow showers. Partly sunny. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 0 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated snow showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 24. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight

forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated snow showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: The Lodge, General Store, Locker Building and Tune Center are open from 9 AM to 5 PM daily through April 6. We have power, heat, water and wifi and we are open to the public if you are in need. We plan to run the Green, Red and Purple Chairlifts this Saturday and Sunday from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Lift tickets are $25 daily and free for those 8 and under or 70 and over. Thanks for a great ski season at Nub's Nob.
